keyword: how many calories in a texas roadhouse roll
title: How Many Calories in a Texas Roadhouse Roll?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Texas Roadhouse roll, including carbs, protein, fat, and nutrition details for easy tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in a Texas Roadhouse Roll?
assumptions: Standard Texas Roadhouse dinner roll (fresh-baked yeast roll, ~50 g), plain without added butter or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by restaurant preparation, roll size, and exact recipe; values are approximate. Check with Texas Roadhouse for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A Texas Roadhouse roll provides about 110 kcal, mostly from carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories are in one Texas Roadhouse roll?
faqs.a: About 110 kcal for a plain roll.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in a Texas Roadhouse roll?
faqs.a: Approximately 20 g carbs, including 1 g fiber and 3 g sugars.

faqs.q: Does a Texas Roadhouse roll have much protein?
faqs.a: Only about 3 g protein per roll.

faqs.q: How many calories if I add the honey butter?
faqs.a: Adding cinnamon honey butter can increase it to around 210 kcal.

faqs.q: Are Texas Roadhouse rolls high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, about 150 mg sodium per roll due to the dough and baking process.
